attributes.action: Increase Sentences for Carrying and Using Knives, at this time Not Working.
attributes.additional_details:
It’s Horrible seeing the news each day with Lives lost.

Please Support
attributes.background:
Far too many Knifes on the Streets with more or less Daily Deaths, needs more Stop and Search as the Local Police Officers get to know the ones who are likely to carry them, Needs Curbing Urgently.

This puts people off going into certain areas more so at Night.
